title: [Update: Sneak peek] Nothing starts teasing its first smartphone, could launch this month
content:
After making waves with its first product, the Nothing Ear (1), Nothing is gearing up to enter the smartphone world. In November, the brand revealed that it was working on five new products and rumor has it that one of these products will be a smartphone, which could hit the market this month. Nothing has

The post [Update: Sneak peek] Nothing starts teasing its first smartphone, could launch this month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Nothing has started teasing the launch of its upcoming product on social media. It could launch launch sometime later this month.
